item.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:Intersects> <gml:Envelope> <gml:lowerCorner>14.05 46.46</gml:lowerCorner> <gml:upperCorner>17.24 48.42</gml:upperCorner> </gml:Envelope> </ogc:Intersects> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> <ogc:SortBy> <ogc:SortProperty> <ogc:SortOrder>DESC</ogc:SortOrder> </ogc:SortProperty> </ogc:SortBy> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>invalidPropertyName</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:Intersects> <ogc:PropertyName>invalidGeometryProperty</ogc:PropertyName> <gml:Envelope> <gml:lowerCorner>14.05 46.46</gml:lowerCorner> <gml:upperCorner>17.24 48.42</gml:upperCorner> </gml:Envelope> </ogc:Intersects> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> <ogc:SortBy> <ogc:SortProperty> <ogc:PropertyName>invalidSortByProperty</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:SortOrder>DESC</ogc:SortOrder> </ogc:SortProperty> </ogc:SortBy> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal></ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> <ogc:SortBy> <ogc:SortProperty> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:SortOrder>invalidSortOrder</ogc:SortOrder> </ogc:SortProperty> </ogc:SortBy> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:myogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <myogc:Filter> <myogc:And> <myogc:PropertyIsBetween> <myogc:PropertyName>dc:title</myogc:PropertyName> </myogc:PropertyIsBetween> </myogc:And> </myogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsBetween> <ogc:PropertyName>dc:title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:LowerBoundary></ogc:LowerBoundary> <ogc:UpperBoundary></ogc:UpperBoundary> </ogc:PropertyIsBetween> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:Intersects> <ogc:PropertyName>ows:BoundingBox</ogc:PropertyName> </ogc:Intersects> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:Beyond> <ogc:PropertyName>ows:BoundingBox</ogc:PropertyName> <gml:Envelope> <gml:lowerCorner>14.05 46.46</gml:lowerCorner> <gml:upperCorner>17.24 48.42</gml:upperCorner> </gml:Envelope> </ogc:Beyond> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>anytext</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>a</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/foo"> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" escapeChar="\" singleChar="?"> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>idDelete?</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsInvalid> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>idDelete?</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsInvalid> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>
